question: A museum near your home is looking for people to do part-time voluntary/unpaid work. You would like to do some voluntary/ unpaid work at the museum.Write a letter to the museum director to apply for the voluntary/unpaid work. In your letter•	Explain why you want to do voluntary/unpaid work at the museum•	Describe some skills and qualities you have that would be useful•	Give details of when you would be available for work
text: I saw your announcement in the daily newspaper today. As the museum is located in my neighbourhood. I’m writing to apply for  voluntary work there.

I have participated in some voluntary programs before. It is so satisfying. In addition, it gives me the opportunity to communicate with people. I am interested in history and due to my job, I am good at presentations. Also, I have read a lot of books and I have a good range of general information which I believe is practical for working as a presenter there. As I mentioned before, I work at the primary school near the museum and I can join the voluntary program in the afternoons every day. I am really excited about this job and I can start on Saturday.
I look forward to hearing from you. Would you please be kind enough to call and notify me of the position? I will be available every afternoon at 356 091 7271.
